utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Do you think they have yesterday's daily news?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Just wanna check my horoscope, see if it was right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God. Phoebe. Don't look now, but behind us is a guy who has the potential to break our hearts and plunge us into a pit of depression.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Where? Ooh, come to Momma.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He's coming. Be cool, be cool, be cool.

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: Nice hat.

utterance.speaker: Monica and Phoebe
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We should do something. Whistle.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We are not going to whistle.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on, do it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Do it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Do it do it do it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Woo-woo!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can't believe you did that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why did I 'woo-hoo'? I mean, what was I hoping would happen? That-that he'd turn round and say 'I love that sound, I must have you now'?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I just wish there was something we could do. Hello. Hello, Coma Guy. GET UP, YOU GIRL SCOUT! UP! UP! UP!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe nobody's tried this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I wish we at least knew his name... Look at that face. I mean, even sleeping, he looks smart. I bet he's a lawyer.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but did you see the dents in his knuckles? That means he's artistic.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, he's a lawyer, who teaches sculpting on the side. And- he can dance!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! And, he's the kinda guy who, when you're talking, he's listening, y'know, and not saying 'Yeah, I understand' but really wondering what you look like naked.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I wish all guys could be like him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are there no conscious men in the city for you two?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He doesn't have anyone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, we-we feel kinda responsible.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can't believe you said woowoo. I don't even say woowoo.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, she's coming up! She's coming up!

utterance.speaker: Jay Leno
utterance.content: Folks, when we come back we'll be talking about her new book, 'Euphoria Unbound': the always interesting Nora Tyler Bing. You might wanna put the kids to bed for this one.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, we don't have to watch this. Weekend At Bernie's is on Showtime, HBO, and Cinemax.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No way, forget it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: C'mon, she's your mom!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Exactly. Weekend At Bernie's! Dead guy getting hit in the groin twenty, thirty times! No?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chandler, I gotta tell you, I love your mom's books! I love her books! I cannot get on a plane without one! I mean, this is so cool!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well, you wouldn't think it was cool if you're eleven years old and all your friends are passing around page 79 of 'Mistress Bitch.'

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: C'mon, Chandler, I love your mom. I think she's a blast.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You can say that because she's not your mom.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, please...

utterance.speaker: Paolo
utterance.content: Bona sera.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hi sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: When did Rigatoni get back from Rome?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Last night.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah, so then his plane didn't explode in a big ball of fire?... Just a dream I had- but, phew.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey hey hey! She's on!

utterance.speaker: Paolo
utterance.content: Ah! Nora Bing!

utterance.speaker: Jay Leno
utterance.content: ...Now what is this about you-you being arrested i-in London? What is that all about?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Your mom was arrested?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Shhh, busy beaming with pride.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: ...This is kind of embarrassing, but occasionally after I've been intimate with a man...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now why would she say that's embarrassing?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Shhh.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: ...I just get this craving for Kung Pow Chicken.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: THAT'S TOO MUCH INFORMATION!!

utterance.speaker: Jay Leno
utterance.content: Alright, so now you're doing this whole book tour thing, how is that going?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Oh, fine. I'm leaving for New York tomorrow, which I hate- but I get to see my son, who I love...

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Awww!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is the way that I find out. Most moms use the phone.

utterance.speaker: Jay Leno
utterance.content: Y'know, don't take this wrong, I-I just don't see you a-as a mom, somehow.. I don't mean that, I don't mean that bad...

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Oh no, I am a fabulous mom! I bought my son his first condoms.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ...And then he burst into flames.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Let's see. Congress is debating a new deficit reduction bill... the mayor wants to raise subway fares again... the high today was forty-five... and- oh, teams played sports.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What about Glen? He could be a Glen.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nah... not-not special enough.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh! How about Agamemnon?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Waaay too special.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: I am famished. What do I want...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Please God don't let it be Kung Pow Chicken.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Oh, you watched the show! What'd you think?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I think you need to come out of your shell just a little.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What is this dive? Only you could've picked this place.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Oooh, c'mon, shut up, it's fun. Gimme a hug. Well, I think we're ready for some tequila.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know I am.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Who's doing shots?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm in.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: There y'go. Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, I'm not really a shot drinking kinda guy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Sorry- sorry we're late, we, uh, kinda just, y'know, lost track of time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ...But a man can change.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Anyone want me to appraise anything?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Mrs. Bing, I have to tell you, I've read everything you've ever written. No, I mean it! I mean, when I read Euphoria at Midnight, all I wanted to do was become a writer.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Oh, please, honey, listen, if I can do it, anybody can. You just start with half a dozen European cities, throw in thirty euphemisms for male genitalia, and bam! You have got yourself a book.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Myyy mother, ladies and gentlemen.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Yeah, any messages for room 226?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: You okay there, slugger?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm fine, I'm fine.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: What is with you tonight?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nothing. Nothing nothing nothing.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Okay, thank you. It's the Italian Hand-Licker, isn't it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. It's the one he's licking.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: She's supposed to be with you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're good.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Oh, Ross, listen to me. I have sold a hundred million copies of my books, and y'know why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The girl on the cover with her nipples showing?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: No. Because I know how to write men that women fall in love with. Believe me, I cannot sell a Paolo. People will not turn three hundred twenty-five pages for a Paolo. C'mon, the guy's a secondary character, a, y'know, complication you eventually kill off.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: When?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: He's not a hero. ...You know who our hero is.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The guy on the cover with his nipples showing?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: No, it's you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Please.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: No, really, c'mon. You're smart, you're sexy...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: You are gonna be fine, believe me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-oh...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhhhh.... I'll just pee in the street.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, is Chandler here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, uh, about last night, um, Chandler.. you didn't tell... Okay, 'cause I'm thinking- we don't need to tell Chandler, I mean, it was just a kiss, right? One kiss? No big deal? Right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Right. No big deal.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: In Bizarro World!! You broke the code!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What code?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You don't kiss your friend's mom! Sisters are okay, maybe a hot-lookin' aunt... but not a mom, never a mom!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you guys doing out here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh.. uh.. Well, Joey and I had discussed getting in an early morning racquetball game. But, um, apparently, somebody overslept.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, well, you don't have your racket.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no I don't, because it's being restrung, somebody was supposed to bring me one.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, well you didn't call and leave your grip size.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, you guys spend waaaay too much time together.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I'm scum, I'm scum.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross, how could you let this happen?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't know, God, I... well, it's not like she's a regular mom, y'know? She's, she's sexy, she's...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You don't think my mom's sexy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well... not in the same way...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'll have you know that Gloria Tribbiani was a handsome woman in her day, alright? You think it's easy giving birth to seven children?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I think we're getting into a weird area here...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What're you guys doing out here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, not playing raquetball!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He forgot to leave his grip size!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He didn't get the goggles!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well,sounds like you two have issues.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Goodbye, baby.

utterance.speaker: Paolo
utterance.content: Ciao, bela.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do they wait for me to do this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So are you gonna tell him?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why would I tell him?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How about 'cause if you don't, his mother might.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you guys doing here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhhhh.... he's not even wearing a jockstrap!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: ...What did I ask?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nothing, I just thought I'd stop by.. y'know, after the uh... that I.. y'know, so what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm not really here. Just thought I'd drop these off...on the way.. my way... Do you come here a lot? Without me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No. No! No! ...So, um, do you think he's doing any better than he was this morning?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How would I know? I-I wasn't here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really? Not even to, um, change his PAJAMAS?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're my friend. I-I had to tell you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can't believe it. Paolo kissed my mom?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, um, I don't know if you noticed, but he had a lot to drink, and you know how he gets when he's drun..uh... I can't do this, I did it, it was me, I'm sorry, I kissed your mom.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was really upset about Rachel and Paolo, and I think I had too much tequila, and Nora- um, Mrs. Mom- your Bing- was just being nice, y'know, and- But nothing happened, nothing- Ask Joey, Joey, uh, came in-

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You knew about this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh... y'know, knowledge is a tricky thing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I spent the entire day with you, why didn't you tell me?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, hey, hey, you're lucky I caught them when I did, or else who knows what woulda happened.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks, man, big help.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can't believe this! What the hell were you thinking?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I wasn't- I mean, I-

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, of all my friends, no-one knows the crap I go through with my mom more than you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know-

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can't believe you did this.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler-

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Me neither, y'know what-

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm still mad at you for not telling me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you mad at me for?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler-

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You gotta let me slam the door!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler, I didn't kiss her, he did! See what happens when you break the code?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey-

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah! Huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: 'A Woman Undone, by Rachel Karen Green'.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Thought I'd give it a shot. I'm still on the first chapter. Now, do you think his 'love stick can be liberated from its denim prison'?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I'd say so. And there's no 'j' in 'engorged'.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey Rach.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Going to the hospital tonight?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You just asked me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, maybe it was a trick question. Um, Rachel can we do this now?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. I am so hot!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now, here's a picture of my mother and father on their wedding day. Now you tell me she's not a knockout.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I cannot believe we're having this conversation.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: C'mon! Just try to picture her not pregnant, that's all.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thanks. Hi, um, 'kay. I'd like to start with a song that's about a man that I recently met, who's, um, come to be very important to me. 'Kay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, that was Phoebe Buffay, everybody. Woo!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What was that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, uh, Phoebe just started a...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I believe I was talking to Joey, alright there, Mother-Kisser?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Mother-Kisser... I'll shut up.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler, can I just say something? I-I know you're still mad at me, I just wanna say that there were two people there that night. Okay? Two sets of lips.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, well, I expect this from her. Okay? She's always been a Freudian nightmare.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, well, if she always behaves like this, why don't you say something?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because it's complicated, it's complex- Hey, you kissed my mom!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's very funny. We done now?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! Okay, you mean, you're not gonna talk to her, you're not gonna tell her how you feel?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That would be no. Look, just because you played tonsil tennis with my mom doesn't mean you know her. Alright? Trust me, you can't talk to her.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Alright, whadyou do with him?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh! You're awake!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Look at you! How, how do you feel?

utterance.speaker: Coma Guy
utterance.content: Uh, a little woozy, but basically okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You look good!

utterance.speaker: Coma Guy
utterance.content: I feel good! ...Who are you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, sorry.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm Phoebe Buffay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm Monica Geller. I've been taking care of you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, we both have.

utterance.speaker: Coma Guy
utterance.content: So, the Etch-a-Sketch is from you guys?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, actually it's just from me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I got you the foot massager.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know who shaved you? That was me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I read to you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I sang. Hah!

utterance.speaker: Coma Guy
utterance.content: Well,... thanks.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, my pleasure.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're welcome.

utterance.speaker: Coma Guy
utterance.content: So. I guess I'll see you around.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What, that's it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: "See you around?"

utterance.speaker: Coma Guy
utterance.content: Well, what do you want me to say?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I don't know. Maybe, um, "That was nice?" Admit something to me? "I'll call you?"

utterance.speaker: Coma Guy
utterance.content: Alright, I'll call you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don't think you mean that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is so typical. Y'know, we give, and we give, and we give. And then- we just get nothing back! And then one day, y'know, it's just, you wake up, and "See you around!" Let's go, Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y'know what? We thought you were different. But I guess it was just the coma.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Car's waiting downstairs, I just wanted to drop off these copies of my book for your friends. Anything you want from Lisbon?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, just knowing you're gonna be there is enough.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Alright, well, be good, I love you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You kissed my best Ross! ...Or something to that effect.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: O-kay. Look, it, it was stupid.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really stupid.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Really stupid. And I don't even know how it happened. I'm sorry, honey, I promise it will never happen again. Are we okay now?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. No. No...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah, the forbidden love of a man and his door.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Shh. He did it. He told her off, and not just about the kiss, about everything.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're kidding.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no. He said "When are you gonna grow up and start being a mom?"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Then she came back with "The question is, when are you gonna grow up and realise I have a bomb?"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 'Kay, wait a minute, are you sure she didn't say "When are you gonna grow up and realise I am your mom?"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That makes more sense.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, what's going on now?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I dunno, I've been standing here spelling it out for you! I don't hear anything. Oh, wait, wait, wait.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whaddya see?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hard to tell, they're so tiny and upside-down. Wait, wait. They're walking away... they're walking away... No, no they're not, they're coming right at us! Run! Run!

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: You okay, kiddo?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, okay.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Alright.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nice save.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mrs. Bing.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Mr. Geller.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You mean that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, why not. So I told her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? How'd it go?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Awful. Awful. Couldn'ta gone worse.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, howdya feel?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Pretty good! I told her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, see? So, maybe it wasn't such a bad idea, y'know, me kissing your mom, uh? Huh? But.. we don't have to go down that road.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Now this is just the first chapter, and I want your absolute honest opinion. Oh, oh, and on page two, he's not 'reaching for her heaving beasts'.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's a 'niffle'?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You usually find them on the 'heaving beasts'.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, alright, so I'm not a great typist...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait, did you get to the part about his 'huge throbbing pens'? Tell ya, you don't wanna be around when he starts writing with those!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, that's it! Give it back! That's it!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Nooo!
